name: Soccer Star 2020 Football Game
description:
The new season has started and the new football game of football cards will bring a lot of fun and goals to your mobile phone! Download now this football game and start your adventure in the soccer world as a professional football player. You will be able to play in all the football leagues around the world and if you become in a good footballer, you will be called by the national football team to go to the international tournaments like the world cup!

You will have to start in a small team of a small football league but if you score important goals and become in the hero of your football team, you will be signed by a more important football team of a higher league so start to play matches and try to be the hero of each match in this soccer story!

Enter on the football pitch and play with your teammates to get the victory and win the football league, use the football cards to improve your player and train your skills in each match day to become a better footballer. When you finish each soccer match, you can go to the casino with your teammates or you can buy a lot of luxury productos to improve your social status.

There are many different football cards and each one has a different effect in your player: you will find cards with personal trainers to improve your power, speed, strength, technique and free kicks, cards with football agents to find better football teams to play, cards with football boots to play with a higher level in each football match and in the last place but not less important, you will have cards with an offensive and defensive tactics to make the difference in each football match.

You will have to pay attention to your relationships with your trainer, girlfriend, teammates, fans and sponsors and care as much as you can because if your relationships are not good, your career won’t advance in the best way and you won’t be able to play in the best football teams of the world and you won’t win the most important football tournaments of the world like the world cup or the european football teams like the spanish league or the english league.

There a lot of new features on Soccer Star 2020 Football Cards, but the main ones are:

*Use your football cards: Play each weekend in the football league and start to collect football cards to improve your footballer. You can trade your football cards, combine it to improve the effect of each one and use a different one each match to get the victory and be the hero of the match!
*Score incredible goals: We have created a lot of different plays with different levels of difficulty in this football game so score with a free kick, a penalty or a scissor kick and be the hero of each football match!
*Train your football skills: Use the football cards and the energy to improve your technique, strength, power, speed and free kicks each match day and become in the best soccer player of this football game!
*Have a luxurious life: Win each football match of this football game and you will earn coins that you will can spend to buy luxury cars, luxury houses and more things. All these things will help you to have a better relationship with the sponsors and you can impress to your girlfriend and friends of this football game

You have to win as many football matches as you can to promote your team to the highest division of the country where you are playing. Remember that the best football teams of the football games are in europe because of the champions football tournament and the world cup. We know that you will be the best of this football game and all the football games!

The football games are advancing so we introduced these football cards to expand the possibilities of your player and now, you will have to pay attention a lot of different things to advance in your career as the best footballer, as the hero who scores all the important goals of his team!
